page.title: 18Majorettes
page.content: I go to{majorettes}on Mondays and Thursdays at Trafalgar Place Community Centre. The times are 5:30-7:00pm on Mondays, and 5:00-6:30pm on Thursdays. We have{8 girls}and{2 teachers,}and a fully qualified trainer comes once a month. We do a few displays and take part in competitions where we enter troupe routines, military routines, solos and duos. We also enter the Hayling Island and Lee-on-Solent Carnivals. We are planning to get a {mace}soon and then we can enter the mace sections. Our uniforms are red and white hats, with a red or white star, red jackets, white blouses with blue chiffon ties, white skirts with blue towelling pants, short white socks and plimsolls. -Melanny Cox Penhale Middle School
